name: Beat Shake
description:
THE ORIGINAL BEAT SHAKE
Fast, Funny and the First ;)

"In order to understand recursion, one must first understand recursion."

=========
FEATURES
=========

+ Shake device to beat
+ 2 Tap to change melody

Thanks to everyone for feedback ;)
